com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors

Interface Actor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Alien, CloseCombatAlien, CloseCombatWeapon, KamikazeAlien, Mine, RapidFireAlien, RapidFireWeapon, Tower, Unit, Weapon

    public interface Actor
    Interface implemented by the Unit and Tower classes. Used for entities within the game that can act and be destroyed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act(float delta)
      Makes the Actor act
      void destroy()
      Destroys the Actor
      void dispose()
      Dispose of unused resources
      boolean getExists()
      Returns the exist state of the Actor
      void render(float delta)
      Render the Actor.
      void takeDamage(double damage)
      Causes the Units health to lower by the damage parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(float delta)
        Render the Actor.
        Parameters:
        delta - - The time in seconds since the last render.

      • act

        void act(float delta)
        Makes the Actor act
        Parameters:
        delta - - The time in seconds since the last render.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys the Actor

      • getExists

        boolean getExists()
        Returns the exist state of the Actor
        Returns:
        true if the Actor exists, false if the Actor does not exist

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage(double damage)
        Causes the Units health to lower by the damage parameter.
        Parameters:
        damage - Causes the Unit's health to deplete.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Dispose of unused resources
